name: Hearts Online
description:
Enjoy the classic game of Hearts with real live players!

Hearts Online is the best multi-player Hearts game available for Android. Just press play and you are matched up with human players from all around the world. Want to play with your friends? Create custom games for them to join. There are multiple scoring modes and rule sets for you to choose from, so gameplay never gets old!

Build your own custom avatar and friend other players to play with them again in the future. Engaging sounds and graphics round out this fun and thrilling online game.

Features:

• Classic Hearts gameplay with real live players
• Choose between instant gameplay and custom games
• Two scoring modes as well as Jack of Diamonds rule
• Customizable avatars and user names
• Friend other players to play with them again
• Keep track of your player statistics
